title: # 427 - Chris Porter & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian Chris Porter to talk about meeting Kid Rock, Last Comic Standing, getting hit with a golf ball, why people are moving out of LA, and much more! 

Get tickets to Chris’s virtual show on August 28th at http://www.rushtix.com 

This podcast is brought to you by Theragun. Go to http://www.theragun.com/Bertcast and get your Gen 4 Theragun today.

This podcast is also brought to you by Buffalo Trace Whiskey. Go to http://www.Buffalotrace.com to order yours today.

This episode is also brought to you by Miller High Life, The Champagne of Beers. A quality beer within everyone’s reach. Please enjoy responsibly 

This podcast is also brought to you by Whoop. Go to http://www.Whoop.com and use the Code "Bert" at checkout to save 15%. 

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
